channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Home Rescue
channel.desc: R?is?n, Peter and the crew come to the rescue Maria at the small apartment she shares with young sons and her mum. She has relegated herself to a corner of the living room which also houses the dining area and the kitchen.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Flat Out Fabulous
channel.desc: Old friends Connor, Chloe and Albi are hoping the 'Flat out Fabulous' team can give the dullest room in their house a new lease of life.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Farmhouse Facelift
channel.desc: Billy and Carolyn renovate a young family's outdated farmhouse to give the interior a beautiful and functional Georgian inspired look.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Escape To The Country
channel.desc: People seeking to get away from city life ask the experts to help them find their perfect country home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: School Night Dinners
channel.desc: A nutritious breakfast is on the menu featuring Dy Rupy from The Doctor's Kitchen. Then, they twist up a mac and squeeze- because there's nothing better than home-cooked goodness.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Good Food Kitchen
channel.desc: Adam opens the episode with a simple make ahead dinner party showstopper while guest chef Hugh Allen shows us how to elevate our steak with his Wagyu rib eye.
